name: ThatQuiz.org Prettifier
description: While doing a linear graphing test on ThatQuiz (So fascinate!111!111!!1!!) I noticed that the website's appearance was really boring. All grey! So, I decided to do something about it. Install this script to add colour and fun to the site!
